title: Sunny, Spacious Victorian 2BR 1BA HW DW 2 Porches 1 Car BUS TO HVD9/1
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 270237707', 'Rent: $2,150 / Month', 'Beds: 2', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Pet: Cats Only', 'Parking:: off-street parking', 'PLEASE CALL WITH ANY QUESTIONS OR TO SCHEDULE A SHOWING.', ' SHOWINGS CANNOT BE SCHEDULED VIA EMAIL OR TEXT', 'Sunny and spacious 2 bedroom unit located on the second floor of three family Victorian home.', 'The unit features high ceilings, refinished hardwood floors, and natural wood molding in most rooms.', 'There is a large living room, a formal dining room with a built-in hutch, and two large bedrooms.', 'The kitchen has been updated with white cabinets, dishwasher, disposal, refrigerator, and gas range.', 'Additionally, there is a large storage area.', 'This unit has an enclosed rear porch and a large open-air front porch.', '1 off-street parking spot is included.', 'THERE IS NO SECOND CAR OPTION.', ' Heat is by oil and tenant pays for all of their own utilities.', 'Very short distance to the 73 bus with service to Harvard Square.', 'Easy access to the river roads into Cambridge and Boston and to routes 2, 128, and the Mass Pike.', 'Available 9/1.', 'A cat is OK, but sorry NO DOGS, and smoking is NOT PERMITTED INSIDE THE APARTMENT.', 'FEATURES', 'Balcony', 'Ceramic Tiled Bath', 'Dining Room', 'Dishwasher', 'Eat-in Kitchen', 'Hardwood Floors', 'Laundry in Unit', 'Living Room', 'Pantry', 'Separate Kitchen', 'Storage', 'Vinyl Replacement Windows', 'Prices and availability are subject to change without notice.', ' Photos of managed buildings may be representative only and not of the actual unit available.', ' Not responsible for typographical errors.']
